#summary How to integrate PocketSphinx ASR into UniMRCP server.
#labels Id-41,Phase-Deploy

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

=1. Overview =
This guide describes how to use PocketSphinx ASR with UniMRCP server. It assumes you are already familiar with [InstallationGuide installation] and [ConfigurationGuide configuration] tips of UniMRCP server.
UniMRCP server provides plugin interface to integrate 3-rd party TTS and ASR engines.

=2. Requirements =
UniMRCP r1030 and above
SphinxBase library (http://www.unimrcp.org/dependencies/sphinxbase-0.4.99-latest.tar.gz)
PocketSphinx library (http://www.unimrcp.org/dependencies/pocketsphinx-0.5.99-latest.tar.gz)
PocketSphinx model (http://www.unimrcp.org/dependencies/communicator_semi_6000_20080321.tar.gz)

==VS2005 Build (Windows XP, Vista, ...)==

=4. Configuration =
Specify mrcpcepstral as a plugin in unimrcpserver.xml as follows:
{{{
    <plugin>
      <engine name="PocketSphinx-1" class="mrcppocketsphinx" enable="1"/>
    </plugin>
}}}
